title: Workshop on Designing Digital Solutions for Improving Health of Children and Adolescents Undergoing Anticancer Treatment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in health education
context.additional_context: Corporate manager training program conducting team-based project development and evaluation in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: A contextual instructional design framework can be utilized to develop a mobile app planning document for cancer patients
A child- and adolescent-friendly health promotion content prototype can be developed following user-centered design principles
An educational solution evaluation strategy can be established by applying expert validation procedures (e.g., Content Validation Index)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
